channel.title: Exeption in "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI Press any key to continu
channel.description: I'm currently using the hosphin server thing and i'm playing on it on my computer and i made some changes and i wanted 2 let my little brother play it with me but when i sent him the folders and when he tries to run the hosphin client it says exeption in "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI Press any key to continue... Does any1 know how to fix it? i hav the egui files in the folder and theres no difference between the one i hav and the one he has i dunno what's the problem it works fine on my comp. our computers are connected with a router. some1 help please. thank you.

item.title: Exeption in "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI Press any key to continu
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

doesnt really matter, i hate gui’s popping up… my way goes straight to the client

Read full topic

item.title: Exeption in "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI Press any key to continu
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

No, open the run.bat and remove the stuff inside it and replace with this @echo off title Client java -Xmx500m -cp . EGUI pause

Read full topic

item.title: Exeption in "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI Press any key to continu
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

compile.

If that doesn’t work right click and click edit and change EGUI to client
